original_definition: 'active mode' means a condition in which the equipment is connected to the mains power source and at least one of the main functions has been activated;
generated_definition: 'active mode' means a mode providing additional functions, including via a remote switch, a remote control, an internal sensor or timer.

Article\u00a02: ‘reactivation function’ means a function that via a remote switch, a remote control, an internal sensor or timer provides a switch from standby mode to another mode, including active mode, providing additional functions;

‘reactivation function’ means a function that via a remote switch, a remote control, an internal sensor or timer provides a switch fromstandby modeto another mode, includingactive mode, providing additional functions;
‘active mode’ means a condition in which theequipmentis connected to themainspower source and at least one of themain functions has been activated;
